beer.beer_description:
Brewed for Saltram of Barossa at Matilda Bay's Garage brewery.

Pepperjack ale brings together the best in craft brewing and contemporary Barossa winemaking. This rouge coloured ale has been created using the finest malted barely grains, intensely aromatic hops and Pepperjack's very own Barossa Valley Shiraz. Exhibiting profound fruit driven aromatics that add tothe complexity of the uniqueselectionof barley and hop, Pepperjack Ale can be enjoyed on any occasion but is best suited to your fridge rather than your cellar.

items.badge_description: Watching the Women's World Cup? The most beautiful game in the world deserves the most beautiful beverage in the world. When you earned this one did it feel like you scored a... GOOOAAALLL!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 60 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 13!
Travel much? You must be a "brewsetter". That's at least a beer from 20 different countries. Try 5 more for Level 5!
It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 5 different fruited beers. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.checkin_comment: (2011) Winery brewing beer? I was willing to give them the benefit of the doubt, but with every bottle that followed, I felt more insulted. There's just nothing there with this one.
